item.description:
Shake off the holiday food coma and stay alert folks! Lots to do and discuss!

At this meeting we will discuss some of the projects going on and what we need to do next in our efforts. We will also be discussing how to plan for the worst and prepare ourselves for what may be tougher times ahead. There is no better time to think outside the box and be ready not only to weather our own possible storm, but to be ready to help others through a difficult time as well.

I look forward to seeing you there!
item.name: West Springfield Meeting
